ai-pp2.6:1.1_0: But here the person who does not familiarize these things in regard to things that weren’t capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight, and the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha.
ai-pp2.6:2.1_0: Take the case of the person who does not understand about formerly things, and does not experience such things as things, and you can’t be seen, heard, thought, and known, attained to the Independent of others.
ai-pp2.6:3.1_0: Take the case of the person who doesn’t truly understand about things that entail suffering in the present life. They’re dissatisfied and experienced in the present life, and when they’re not seen, heard, thought, and known,
ai-pp2.6:4.1_0: Take the case of the person who doesn’t truly understand regarding things that entail suffering in the present life.
ai-pp2.6:5.1_0: Take the case of the person who, beforening them isn’t able to realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and the complete ending of suffering in this very life. You should become a non-returner.
ai-pp2.6:6.1_0: Take the case of the person who, beforening them isn’t able to realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they don’t become a stream-entererer.
